title: Can't duo with my friend because it says difference in rank is too high
body: We haven't played any placement matches yet and were both platinum last season but it still says we cant q together because the difference in rank is too high.

replies.body: Could either you or your friend have possibly been disqualified from ranked rewards and later had the border removed? If so, you won't be able to Q together since one would technically not have a past rank to go off of. Other than that, it does look like the status page mentions some current issues with Qing together so we may just need to wait a bit.

kinda have the same problem.

is does one of you have his boarder removed? (support request or ban?)
if yes i think that could be the issue
